description: Gap: Mitigation scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately RCP3.4 global forcing pathway with SSP4 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing reaches a level of 3.4 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP4, RCP3.4, future,  Low forcing, Gap: Mitigation
long_name: gap-filling scenario reaching 3.4 based on SSP4
rationale: The scenario fills a gap at the low end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.  Of interest to mitigation policy, since mitigation costs differ substatially between forcing levels of 4.5 W/m2 and 2.6 W/m2.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4, future, 21st century, SSP4, RCP3.4
requirements.label: RCP34 Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
